Akkasah: Center for Photography (NYU Abu Dhabi)
"Africa Album" - A trip across northern Algeria AD.MC.063
150 Photographic Prints
Circa 1912-1920
Content Description
Album of over 150 original albumen photographs which document a British traveler's rail and horseback trip through Algeria including Oran, Tipaza, Constantine and Timgad c. 1912-1920. Photographs show cities and towns, historical ruins, landscapes, and portraits of local people.
Photographic Prints Algeria
